Twenty Years

1048

二十年

Nijū-nen

Twenty Years

Episode 1075 (p. 2-17)
Chapter Chronology
← Previous Next →

Chapter 1048 is titled "Twenty Years".

Contents

  • 1 Cover Page
  • 2 Short Summary
  • 3 Long Summary
  • 4 Quick References
    • 4.1 Chapter Notes
    • 4.2 Characters
  • 5 Author Comment
  • 6 Arc Navigation

Cover Page[]

Germa 66's Ahh... An Emotionless Excursion, Vol. 10: "I think Germa's come to Chocolat Town!!"

Brûlée reports to Cracker that she believes that Ichiji and Reiju are already in Chocolat Town.

Short Summary[]

Momonosuke headbutts Onigashima to get it out of the way of Luffy's attack, and Kaidou unveils a new technique to try to protect himself but fails due to Luffy's previous mastery of Ryuo and both attacks clash. Kawamatsu thinks back to the day 20 years ago when Kaidou and Orochi's forces attacked Kuri to kill Momonosuke and the beginning of Kaidou and Orochi's enslavement of Wano Country.

Denjiro saves Hiyori from Orochi's attack and the people at the Fire Festival release their paper lanterns in the air with their wish to become free again as Luffy and Kaidou's attacks continue to clash.

Long Summary[]

Momonosuke tells Luffy that he cannot move Onigashima out of the way, but the memory of his family compels him to try anyway. Kaidou tells Luffy that he will take his attack head on as he starts covering himself in fire, a move called Kaen Daiko. While doing so, he tells Luffy that Oden died twenty years ago by burning to death, and ever since then, Wano became a lawless land filled with people desperately waiting for their "savior" to appear. The fire causes Luffy to let go, which Kaidou says is the right call and that he had no intention of running, though it was because he was confident Luffy would not be able to crush him with his fist because he would vaporize it. Kaidou then performs a move called Shoryu: Kaen Hakke while Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Bajrang Gun, all the while thinking back to when Hyougoro taught him advanced-grade Armament Haki, and the two attacks clash.

Inside the castle, Usopp tries to keep Kin'emon and Kikunojo from drowning and the other samurai cheer for Luffy to defeat Kaidou, with Kawamatsu saying that unless Kaidou is defeated, then their long nightmare will not end. He thinks about when he and the rest fled the Flower Capital after Oden was killed, and Orochi yelled that they would most definitely head back to Kuri to protect Momonosuke, only for Kaidou to say he would take care of him himself. As a result, several loyal samurai were struck down by Kaidou and the castle was burnt to the ground. Kouzuki Toki was pronounced dead in Bakura Town and no one else was found, which led to Orochi believing the Kouzuki line had finally ended.

After that, Orochi and Kaidou confronted the remaining daimyo to see who they would side with, and they all quickly picked up arms against them, saying they refuse to recognize a shogun that is not Oden and will avenge him. Sadly, they did not stand a chance against Kaidou, and because of that, none of them could depose Orochi, who continued to enjoy tormenting his people. Their actions would lead to several samurai being imprisoned and forced to work as slaves by the Beasts Pirates, the factories polluting the water, and eventually killing all the crops. Still, several samurai kept believing in Toki's words. Orochi would later start feeding the people of Ebisu Town faulty SMILEs to make them only capable of smiling and laughing even when they are actually sad, which he said was a fitting fate for them all.

In the present, Orochi, still on fire, tries to attack Hiyori, but Denjiro arrives in time and slices Orochi's final head off, ending the psychotic shogun's reign for good. Surprisingly, one of the wishes written on the sky lanterns was "please make Orochi disappear", while another one is "free us from this hell", which Luffy is still working on with his clash with Kaidou.

Quick References[]

Chapter Notes[]

  • Momonosuke remembers his family from 20 years ago and headbutts Onigashima.
  • The battle between Luffy and Kaidou continues.
    • Kaidou uses a new technique that allows his entire dragon form to become extremely hot, causing Luffy to let go of him. As an example, a portion of Onigashima's horns melts in the process.
    • Luffy then unleashes his new attack on Kaidou.
  • Usopp and Hamlet accidentally drop Kin'emon and Kikunojo due to panic caused by a water surge.
  • A flashback shows the events after Oden's death 20 years ago.
    • Kaidou attacks Kuri with Orochi to hunt down Momonosuke after learning of his existence along with the remaining Kouzuki retainers, and burns down the Kouzuki Clan castle.
    • Shimotsuki Ushimaru, Shimotsuki Yasuie, Fugetsu Omusubi and Uzuki Tempura, as Daimyo of the other regions of Wano, attack Kaidou and Orochi.
    • After their resistance failed, Orochi started taking all capable men to work at the Prisoner Mine in Udon, leaving women and children behind at their homes.
    • The effects of the activities at the mines were seen throughout the country, with water becoming undrinkable, infertile land and air pollution.
    • Orochi starts feeding the remaining citizens with defective SMILE fruits, and was seen rejoicing with his courtesans during the tragedy.
  • At the present, a still burning Orochi attempts to kill Hiyori.
    • Denjiro protects Hiyori by decapitating Orochi's remaining head.
  • The citizens of the Flower Capital continue to celebrate the Fire Festival and release their paper lanterns into the sky.
    • The wishes of the people on the lanterns are revealed of their wish to be free of Orochi and Kaidou.

  • Shimotsuki Ushimaru (flashback)
  • Shimotsuki Yasuie (flashback)
  • Fugetsu Omusubi (flashback)
Mokomo Dukedom
  • Nekomamushi (flashback)
Germa Kingdom
  • Vinsmoke Reiju (image; cover)
  • Vinsmoke Ichiji (image; cover)

Author Comment[]


Author Comment
  • Translation
  • Original


I'm currently addicted to konnyaku yam cakes! They're great in cold noodle dishes and udon. Miso dengaku is the best.


こんにゃくブーム！冷やし中華やうどんこんにゃくうまい。味噌田楽は最強です

—Eiichiro Oda
English translation by VIZ Media. For comprehensive translation credits, see here.

'''Chapter 1048''' is titled "Twenty Years".

==Cover Page==
[[Germa 66's Ahh... An Emotionless Excursion]], Vol. 10: "I think Germa's come to Chocolat Town!!"

[[Charlotte Brûlée|Brûlée]] reports to [[Charlotte Cracker|Cracker]] that she believes that [[Vinsmoke Ichiji|Ichiji]] and [[Vinsmoke Reiju|Reiju]] are already in [[Cacao Island#Chocolat Town|Chocolat Town]].

==Short Summary==
[[Kouzuki Momonosuke|Momonosuke]] headbutts [[Onigashima]] to get it out of the way of [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]]'s attack, and [[Kaidou]] unveils a new technique to try to protect himself but fails due to Luffy's previous mastery of [[Haki/Armament Haki#Emission|Ryuo]] and both attacks clash. [[Kawamatsu]] thinks back to the day 20 years ago when Kaidou and [[Kurozumi Orochi|Orochi]]'s forces attacked [[Kuri]] to kill Momonosuke and the beginning of Kaidou and Orochi's enslavement of [[Wano Country]].

[[Denjiro]] saves [[Kouzuki Hiyori|Hiyori]] from Orochi's attack and the people at the Fire Festival release their paper lanterns in the air with their wish to become free again as Luffy and Kaidou's attacks continue to clash.

==Long Summary==
[[Kouzuki Momonosuke|Momonosuke]] tells [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] that he cannot move [[Onigashima]] out of the way, but the memory of his family compels him to try anyway. [[Kaidou]] tells Luffy that he will take his attack head on as he starts covering himself in fire, a move called '''[[Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu#Kaidou|Kaen Daiko]]'''. While doing so, he tells Luffy that [[Kouzuki Oden|Oden]] died twenty years ago by burning to death, and ever since then, [[Wano Country|Wano]] became a lawless land filled with people desperately waiting for their "savior" to appear. The fire causes Luffy to let go, which Kaidou says is the right call and that he had no intention of running, though it was because he was confident Luffy would not be able to crush him with his fist because he would vaporize it. Kaidou then performs a move called '''Shoryu: Kaen Hakke''' while Luffy uses '''[[Gomu Gomu no Mi/Gear 5 Techniques#Techniques|Gomu Gomu no Bajrang Gun]]''', all the while thinking back to when [[Hyougoro]] taught him [[Haki/Armament Haki#Emission|advanced-grade Armament Haki]], and the two attacks clash.

Inside the castle, [[Usopp]] tries to keep [[Kin'emon]] and [[Kikunojo]] from drowning and the other samurai cheer for Luffy to defeat Kaidou, with [[Kawamatsu]] saying that unless Kaidou is defeated, then their long nightmare will not end. He thinks about when he and the rest fled the [[Flower Capital]] after Oden was killed, and [[Kurozumi Orochi|Orochi]] yelled that they would most definitely head back to [[Kuri]] to protect Momonosuke, only for Kaidou to say he would take care of him himself. As a result, several loyal samurai were struck down by Kaidou and the castle was burnt to the ground. [[Kouzuki Toki]] was pronounced dead in Bakura Town and no one else was found, which led to Orochi believing the Kouzuki line had finally ended.

After that, Orochi and Kaidou confronted the remaining daimyo to see who they would side with, and they all quickly picked up arms against them, saying they refuse to recognize a shogun that is not Oden and will avenge him. Sadly, they did not stand a chance against Kaidou, and because of that, none of them could depose Orochi, who continued to enjoy tormenting his people. Their actions would lead to several samurai being imprisoned and forced to work as slaves by the [[Beasts Pirates]], the factories polluting the water, and eventually killing all the crops. Still, several samurai kept believing in Toki's words. Orochi would later start feeding the people of Ebisu Town faulty [[SMILE]]s to make them only capable of smiling and laughing even when they are actually sad, which he said was a fitting fate for them all.

In the present, Orochi, still on fire, tries to attack [[Kouzuki Hiyori|Hiyori]], but [[Denjiro]] arrives in time and slices Orochi's final head off, ending the psychotic shogun's reign for good. Surprisingly, one of the wishes written on the sky lanterns was "please make Orochi disappear", while another one is "free us from this hell", which Luffy is still working on with his clash with Kaidou.

==Quick References==
===Chapter Notes===
*[[Kouzuki Momonosuke|Momonosuke]] remembers his [[Kouzuki Family|family]] from 20 years ago and headbutts [[Onigashima]].
*The battle between [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] and [[Kaidou]] continues.
**Kaidou uses a new technique that allows his entire dragon form to become extremely hot, causing Luffy to let go of him. As an example, a portion of Onigashima's horns melts in the process.
**Luffy then unleashes his new attack on Kaidou.
*[[Usopp]] and [[Hamlet]] accidentally drop [[Kin'emon]] and [[Kikunojo]] due to panic caused by a water surge.
*A flashback shows the events after [[Kouzuki Oden|Oden]]'s [[Legendary Hour|death]] 20 years ago.
**Kaidou attacks [[Kuri]] with [[Kurozumi Orochi|Orochi]] to hunt down Momonosuke after learning of his existence along with the remaining Kouzuki retainers, and burns down the Kouzuki Clan castle.
**[[Shimotsuki Ushimaru]], [[Shimotsuki Yasuie]], [[Fugetsu Omusubi]] and [[Uzuki Tempura]], as Daimyo of the other regions of Wano, attack Kaidou and Orochi.
**After their resistance failed, Orochi started taking all capable men to work at the [[Prisoner Mine]] in [[Udon]], leaving women and children behind at their homes.
**The effects of the activities at the mines were seen throughout the country, with water becoming undrinkable, infertile land and air pollution.
**Orochi starts feeding the remaining citizens with defective [[SMILE]] fruits, and was seen rejoicing with his courtesans during the tragedy.
*At the present, a still burning Orochi attempts to kill [[Kouzuki Hiyori|Hiyori]].
**[[Denjiro]] protects Hiyori by decapitating Orochi's remaining head.
*The citizens of the [[Flower Capital]] continue to celebrate the [[Fire Festival]] and release their paper lanterns into the sky.
**The wishes of the people on the lanterns are revealed of their wish to be free of Orochi and Kaidou.
